ComicInfo.Summary: An alien child arrives on Earth, alone, to grow up to become the most powerful being on the face of the planet...all the time believing he was unique. And then he discovers he's not alone after all. Thus begins the story of GILGAMESH II, a modern re-telling of one of the oldest and greatest stories of the heroic tradition, giving birth to a truly modern super-hero.
ComicInfo.Title: A mad new world
